thread.title: ICYMI: Kristi Yamaguchi Wished Nancy Kerrigan Luck On DWTS With The Most Horribly Worded Tweet EVER!
thread.title_full: ICYMI: Kristi Yamaguchi Wished Nancy Kerrigan Luck On DWTS With The Most Horribly Worded Tweet EVER!

author: Perez Hilton
title: ICYMI: Kristi Yamaguchi Wished Nancy Kerrigan Luck On DWTS With The Most Horribly Worded Tweet EVER!
text:
We are SCREAMING.
Kristi Yamaguchi wished fellow former figure skater Nancy Kerrigan good luck on her current role on Dancing With The Stars , and it was maybe not worded so well.
Related: Is Ryan Reynolds Mean??? 
Kristi tweeted: 
So excited for you @NancyAKerrigan ! Can't wait to see you grace that ballroom floor, break a leg! üíÉüèª #DWTS 
‚Äî Kristi Yamaguchi (@kristiyamaguchi) March 20, 2017 

"Break a leg"??? Uhhhh, does Kristi remember what Tonya Harding had done to Nancy back in 1994? That whole hiring someone to hit her in the leg with a lead pipe thing?!
Maybe she forgot. Time heals all wounds after all. Except shattered bones.
In any case, Twitter wouldn't let her lapse in memory go unpunished. The GIF reactions were SAVAGE:

‚Äî Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) March 22, 2017 
. @kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan pic.twitter.com/YyFPZ8S9S2 
‚Äî Abbi Crutchfield (@curlycomedy) March 22, 2017

‚Äî Micah Singleton (@MicahSingleton) March 22, 2017

‚Äî The Black Madonna (@blackmadonnachi) March 22, 2017

@kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan that wording though... pic.twitter.com/XisJ9CNqXc 
‚Äî Erick Fernandez (@ErickFernandez) March 22, 2017 
@kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan pic.twitter.com/UKmfz2Qgm6

@kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan pic.twitter.com/icIN7NzIPD

@kristiyamaguchi pic.twitter.com/jQVmXjQLoS 
‚Äî Mark Sundstrom (@106th) March 22, 2017 
@kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan pic.twitter.com/TkvFZI4Yha 
‚Äî Deebs (@shumad1) March 22, 2017 
. @kristiyamaguchi @NancyAKerrigan pic.twitter.com/B80TgBZv9v 
‚Äî Eric Francisco (@EricTheDragon) March 22, 2017 
Sorry, Kristi, but you deserved it. Delete your tweet! LMAO!
Anyway, Nancy thanked her, apparently not caring about the wording. So that's nice.
Thank you so much Kristi! I'm excited to get this started said for the advice you had for me. this its a blast! https://t.co/MMagD7gLgw 
‚Äî Nancy Kerrigan (@NancyAKerrigan) March 20, 2017 
We are still screaming!
[ Image via WENN . ]
